name: Padan Fain
leaveText: Trying to slip away are we?

nodes.text: I have goods to buy and news of the world.
optText: I know who you are, Darkfriend!

nodes.text: I doubt you'd have anything I wanted.
They say the King is ill. He wanders the halls at night and coughs blood. None of his physicians know what to do.
How dare you! Leave me at once! You're the DarkFriend not I!
optText: I'll have you run out of town Fain.
I know who you are, Darkfriend!
Poor Fain, all alone in the world.
